mapper.select: select comp_id as companyId,full_name as supplier, link_man as linkMan,link_tel as linkTel,detail_address as address from t_uc_company where full_name like concat('%',#{roughName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%');
select name linkMan,mobile linkTel,detail_address address from t_warehouse_linkman where wh_id =#{whId,jdbcType=BIGINT};
